channel.title: Someone taking my IP on server status
channel.description:
iExiled server is currently using my servers IP dsserver55.no-ip.org on port 5555 without my premission on Moparscape.org Server Status. I would like a response about this and a ban or anything that stops the owner of that server from doing this.
Hope someone responsible on this community reads this.
Thanks.

item.title: Someone taking my IP on server status
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

No, I mean, the person didn’t post if for DSRevolution. He posted it to benefit himself.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone taking my IP on server status

item.title: Someone taking my IP on server status
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

That’s what I basically freaking said in my first post…

runefreak10:

Considered advertising… All the person did was kind of post it for you… But I can understand why you’re mad if you would want to know the password to edit it.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone taking my IP on server status

item.title: Someone taking my IP on server status
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:261476”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=345273.msg2662327#msg2662327 date=1234295941]

Considered advertising… All the person did was kind of post it for you… But I can understand why you’re mad if you would want to know the password to edit it.

Someone is utilizing HIS IP to host their server.
[/quote]

That’s not possible. No one can have the exact same ip as another guy. Unless he never created the ip he wanted with no-ip.[/quote]
Let me elaborate.
I host a server. My IP is Test.No-Ip.Org.
I do not put it on Mopar Server Status, but I keep it up.
Another person adds their server to the server status page with “Test.No-Ip.Org” (My IP.)
They are now using MY IP to be added to the server status page.
Now I will have to close my server and wait for it to go down, then add my server IP again.

Hope I explained it well. =]

Read full topic
item.source: Someone taking my IP on server status

[/quote]
Someone is utilizing HIS IP to host their server.[/quote]

That’s not possible. No one can have the exact same ip as another guy. Unless he never created the ip he wanted with no-ip.

Read full topic
